title: Save up to 44% on an Air Purifying set!
content:

English Ivy, Peace Lilies and Boston Ferns are particularly known for this and are all included in the Air Purifying Set from Oxy-Plants. What’s more, with this exclusive deal, you can get up to 44% off it! Oxy-Plants’ fabulous indoor purifying plants are perfect for the home where cleaning products and mould can contribute to the pollutants in the air. A standard set without pots includes:

  • 1 x English Ivy – a common European vine, it works well in a hanging basket, or even as a trailing ivy on a windowsill. It can help aid sleep and has a host of other fantastic benefits for cleaning the air.
  • 1 x Peace Lily – this tropical indoor house plant will bring peace, tranquillity and elegance to any room.
  • 1 x Boston Fern – with long, graceful fronds bedecked with tiny leaves. It is a relatively tough fern that has a higher tolerance for light and dry conditions than other species.
